content:
System.Activities.Statements.Tracking Namespace

In this Article

Provides classes for monitoring state machine state executions and state transitions.

Classes

StateMachineStateQuery

When added to the queries, subscribes to state machine state execution records.
StateMachineStateRecord

Represents a tracking record that is created when an state machine instance transitions to a state.
